tag_professor: Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This man is the perfect teacher. He will make you really work for this class, but you\'ll come out of it knowing everything you\'d ever need to know about the topics covered as well as how to write a better paper.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His class will stress you out only if you don\'t plan ahead on getting the work done because, yes, there is a lot of it. But it all has a purpose. No busy work. His classes will change your perspective on a lot of things because he\'s a genius.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Hard teacher, but a great guy and super funny. He is brilliant and has a lot to offer and one can learn so much from him.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Challenging class, requires a good amount of reading and individual study. For sophomore music majors, this is a "make or break" course. Dr. Krieger is very professional and an excellent scholar of early music and European history. He is always willing to help, but may push you to your limit. Great experiences overall.
